name: Little Beans
description:
The whole takes place in a pantry of a coffee where the size ratios are a little different. A small flood prevents our Little Bean from touching the ground. Sharp objects and heights are also challenges that our Little Bean has to face.  Will he make it ? This game is a school project of a third class student of the htk academy. Controls:  W-A-S-D = Move Space = Jump E = Interact ESC = Pause Game Mouse = Look around Credits: Special thanks to all the people who helped me with the game.
